meanings.sent1: The lemonade was a bit sourish, but still refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The sourish apple made her pucker her lips.
meanings.sent3: He made a sourish face after tasting the spoiled milk.
meanings.sent4: The sourish smell of vinegar filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sourish grapes left a tangy aftertaste.
